snippet: Tiger Inn, a social club known for its rowdy, hard-drinking atmosphere, is being investigated for one of the emails, which included an explicit photo.
abstract: Adam Krop and Andrew Hoffenberg are removed as officers of a Princeton University eating club know as Tiger Inn after they sent emails that ridiculed women and contained a sexually explicit photograph; both police and university are investigating; survey of membership that led to dismissal of the pair comes as treatment of female students gains urgency on campuses around country.
lead_paragraph: Tiger Inn, a social club known for its rowdy, hard-drinking atmosphere, is being investigated for one of the emails, which included an explicit photo.

headline.main: Princeton Eating Club Ousts 2 Officers Over Emails Ridiculing Women
headline.print_headline: Princeton Eating Club Ousts 2 Officers Over Emails Ridiculing Women
